Name: Reveal The Deep
About the game: Reveal the Deep is a short exploration-based indie game, where the user traverses through the wreck of a 19th century steamship. There is a heavy focus on piecing together the story of the ship's past, through a variety of notes and clues. Puzzles and mysteries will be encountered all the way through!
